body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Timothy Butler and the customer's name is Ruth James.  The conversation is about Rhode Island School of Design (a Art School ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling QuickConnect Services. My name is Alex. May I know your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Alex, my name is Sarah.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sarah! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have a question about my recent order.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Sure, I'd be happy to help with that. Could you please provide me with your order number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's one zero zero two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sarah. Could you also provide me with your email address so I can pull up your details?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. I see your order here. Let me check the details... Ah, I see there was a delay in shipping. I apologize for the inconvenience.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I understand. Can you tell me when I should expect it?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Your order should arrive by the end of this week. We'll also send you an email with the updated tracking information.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Alex. That's all I needed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Sarah. Thank you for your time. Have a great day!
